title: Los Angeles Crime Data Dashboard
descriptionShort: A user-friendly web application for exploring and analyzing Los Angeles crime data
descriptionLong: Given only 3 hours to complete I feel proud of the outcome of this project. This web application provides an interactive and user-friendly way to explore and analyze crime data in Los Angeles. Utilizing powerful data visualization tools, users can filter and compare crime types, areas, and victim demographics, while examining trends and patterns on an interactive map.

title: 1 Hour Challenge: Knowledge Navigator
descriptionLong: KnowledgeNavigator brings the best learning resources from around the web right to your fingertips. Unleash your curiosity with this innovative app that connects you to the best educational resources based on your interests, experience level, and learning goals.

title: Examining the Effectiveness of Tip Redistributing in the Casino Industry
descriptionLong: In this case study, we delve into the effectiveness of tip redistributing within the casino industry, exploring its impact on employee satisfaction, customer experience, and overall business performance. We analyze various tip pooling and sharing systems, while considering the unique dynamics present in the highly competitive and service-oriented casino environment.

title: Interactive Periodic Table of Elements
descriptionLong: This interactive periodic table of elements app is designed to spark your curiosity and deepen your understanding of the building blocks of matter. Dive into the world of elements as you explore detailed information, captivating visuals, and engaging activities tailored to users of all ages and backgrounds.

title: 2 Hour Challenge: The Gambler's Fallacy
descriptionLong: The gambler's fallacy is the mistaken belief that past events in a random process influence future outcomes, despite the probabilities being independent of each other.

title: Knife Grinder
descriptionLong: From a struggling start-up to a profitable venture, this is a story of transformation powered by data analysis and modern marketing strategies.
